translation.en: [male announcer] It's win-or-go-home time at the Women's World Cup.
translation.ko: 다음 라운드 진출이냐, 탈락이냐의 운명이 걸린 경기죠

translation.en: The US team just completed their worst World Cup group stage ever.
translation.ko: 미국 대표 팀은 역대 최악의 조별 리그를 마치고 올라왔습니다

translation.en: [player] We're not playing to our strengths.
We're not seeing the bite we usually have.
[female announcer 1] Nothing's rainbows and butterflies.
translation.ko: 미국 팀이 모든 면에서 고전하고 있어요

translation.en: [female announcer 2] A lotta chatter, noise.
[female announcer 3] The expectation is to dominate the ball,
to dominate the score, to dominate the tempo of games.
translation.ko: 점수를 지배하고 경기 템포를 지배하길 바라죠

translation.en: [female announcer 4] I don't think the respect of wearing the crest
translation.ko: 대표팀 휘장을 달고 국가를 위해 뛴다는 것에 대한 존중심이 없었어요

translation.en: and playing for your country was there.
translation.ko: 국가를 위해 뛴다는 것에 대한 존중심이 없었어요

translation.en: Yes, the performance was crap. We all know that.
translation.ko: 네, 경기력이 엉망이었죠 모두 압니다 "블라트코 안도노프스키 감독"

translation.en: We have to own it, and we have to focus for the next game.
translation.ko: 그걸 인정하고 다음 경기에 집중해야 합니다

translation.en: [woman 1] It's a matter of using the noise
translation.ko: 그런 잡음을 기회로 활용해서 모두의 입을

translation.en: as an opportunity to… shut us all up.
translation.ko: 그런 잡음을 기회로 활용해서 모두의 입을 "칼리 로이드 월드컵 2회 챔피언" 다물게 해야죠

translation.en: There's always a belief, right? It's the US Women's National Team.
translation.ko: 미국 여자 대표 팀에 대해서 믿음이 항상 있잖아요

translation.en: There's always that mentality of,
"They're gonna find a way, and they have to find a way." "No other option."
translation.ko: '그들은 방법을 찾을 것이고 찾아야 한다, 다른 선택지는 없다'

translation.en: "If they don't find a way, they're all gonna pack their bags."
We're not producing players that are getting it done. They're losing.
translation.ko: 해결사를 배출 못 하고 계속 지고 있어요

translation.en: This is a whole thing. So it's a whole range of…
I gotta get out there, though.
[woman 2] Twenty seconds.
[Carli] Thank you.
Five, four, three. Your mics.
[player 1] We're in a pressure cooker. The tournament's a pressure cooker.
translation.ko: 압력솥 안에 든 상황이죠 토너먼트 전체가 압력솥이에요

translation.en: This is a ******* mess.
[player 2] There's always going to be a target on our back.
-[player 3] With the generational change… -[player 2] We are not invincible.
-[player 3] Built into the team's DNA… -[man 1] She missed the whole net.
translation.ko: - 이 팀의 DNA에 들어있는 건… - 맙소사, 다 놓쳤어요

translation.en: [woman 3] This team is just different.
[man 2] It's not just about losing a game.
The big risk is that they become irrelevant. [echoes]
[producer] Slate it?
Can you just sort of explain what happened there?
translation.ko: 무슨 일이 있었는지 설명을 좀 부탁드릴까요?

translation.en: Can you just explain what happened?
What happened exactly?
I think we all understand we have that one goal
translation.ko: 모두의 공통된 목표는 그것 하나일 거예요

translation.en: of winning the World Cup.
That's why you go, to win.
Um, nothing is satisfying… unless you win.
translation.ko: 우승 외에는 어떤 것도 만족스럽지 않아요

translation.en: [player 4] We have had a lot of success in World Cups,
translation.ko: 그동안 월드컵에서 좋은 성과를 많이 거뒀지만

translation.en: but that doesn't mean we've won them all.
[male announcer 1] And the World Cup in Japan.
[player 2] 2015 was a long time coming.
[male announcer 2] Rapinoe has driven ball in towards…
[player 2] We hadn't won a World Cup since '99.
[coach] I'm just so, so proud of this team and these players.
So happy for every little girl that dreams about this.
translation.ko: 선수들 모두가 꿈을 이뤄서 너무 좋습니다

translation.en: [player 2] And then, in 2019, we went in there knowing we were gonna win.
[male announcer 2] Lovely run. Great goal!
[player 2] We came outta there with the trophy.
[male announcer 2] Now the world champions again. Nobody, nobody does it better.
translation.ko: 다시 월드컵 챔피언으로 등극하죠 능가할 자들은 아무도 없습니다

translation.en: [player 6] Winning four World Cups, especially the two back-to-back,
we wanna raise the bar. We want the three-peat.
But the game is different now.
[player 7] So many other teams are so good.
Every game is gonna be an absolute grind.
Everyone is gonna give us their best game.
There's always pressure on us. The expectation is always to win.
translation.ko: 늘 압박감이 커요 사람들은 우승을 기대하니까요

translation.en: Pressure is a fucking privilege on this team.
Go! We better get there.
I mean, to win one is hard.
To win two in a row is unbelievable.
To win three, it has never been done.
[male announcer 3] One of two things. The rebirth of a champion…
translation.ko: 둘 중 하나를 보게 될 겁니다 챔피언의 부활…

translation.en: Work your ass off. This is the most important game of this tournament.
translation.ko: 죽어라 뛰어, 이번 토너먼트에서 제일 중요한 경기야

translation.en: Level these bitches the first second you get a chance. Come on, guys. Let's go!
translation.ko: 첫 기회를 잡자마자 다 밟아버려 가자, 얘들아, 파이팅!

translation.en: [male announcer 3] …or the end of an era.
You guys are digging for headlines already.
[player 4] Soccer, football, is the world's game.
And so, in terms of capturing the world's attention,
every four years in the World Cup, it's a spectacle.
Other teams have made a good case for themselves
translation.ko: 다른 팀들은 그동안 월드컵의 유력 우승 후보임을

translation.en: to be top contenders for the World Cup.
England, for example, winning the Euros.
translation.ko: 예를 들어 잉글랜드는 유럽 선수권 우승자고

translation.en: Spain and Germany are competing incredibly well recently.
translation.ko: 스페인과 독일은 최근에 놀라울 정도로 잘하고 있어요

translation.en: But, of course, there's still a target on our back.
There always will be.
[man] The US team are the favorites. They're trying to three-peat.
translation.ko: 미국 팀은 우승 후보입니다 3연승을 노리고 있어요

translation.en: They're the team that everybody's chasin'.
translation.ko: "이언 라이트 전 잉글랜드 축구 선수" 모든 팀이 뒤쫓는 팀이죠

translation.en: When you wear that crest, you have that pressure and that legacy
translation.ko: 그 유니폼을 입으면 압박감과 지금까지 전해 내려온 유산이 느껴지죠

translation.en: that has been passed down to you
translation.ko: 압박감과 지금까지 전해 내려온 유산이 느껴지죠

translation.en: to represent the team to the highest standard and to win.
translation.ko: 팀을 최고 수준으로 대표하고 우승하라는 것 같아요

translation.en: [player 6] Prior to the World Cup roster, in the back of your head, you're like,
translation.ko: 월드컵 출전자 명단이 나오기 전엔 온통 이 생각뿐이죠

translation.en: "Everything I'm doing right now is being watched,
and this could be make or break, you know, going to the World Cup."
translation.ko: '이걸로 월드컵에 가느냐 마느냐 판가름 날 거다' "린지 호런 미드필더 / 주장"

translation.en: So out of maybe the 30 or more contenders, at the end of the day, it's 23 players.
And that's it.
So for the months prior to the World Cup,
coaching staff, they've got lists of players.
They're watching lots of games,
trying to identify the players that are rising to the top.
And then they call these women into camp.
Beautiful.
"Camp" we just kind of use as any time the team gets together.
translation.ko: '캠프'란 말은 팀이 모일 때마다 붙여요 "신디 팔로 콘 미국 축구 연맹 회장"

translation.en: -What's the weather? -80.
-What? -It's cold.
Going to training. [chuckles]
Trinity Rodman! Whoo!
We got it. We're ahead.
translation.ko: 할 수 있어, 우리가 앞서고 있어

translation.en: It's not like sleepaway camp that young kids go to.
-Good! -[player 8] This is training camp.
Go! That group's done. Well done.
-Focus. -I got it.
Coming into camp is kind of like a tryout.
One ball!
[player 7] It's usually every four weeks, or every six weeks.
Starting with a goal kick. Red team on the goal.
[player 1] So everybody plays for their club team,
and then you get an email invitation
saying, "You've been invited to the US Women's National Team camp
for these dates."
And then, basically, you put your club team on hold,
translation.ko: 그러면 클럽 팀 활동은 잠시 보류하고

translation.en: and you come and do your duty as a national team player.
translation.ko: "린 윌리엄스 포워드" 국가 대표 선수로서의 의무를 다하러 와요

translation.en: All right. Welcome, everyone, again.
It's, uh, exciting to have you back.
Okay, just a reminder until the first World Cup game,
translation.ko: 월드컵 첫 경기까지의 일정을 다시 말하자면

translation.en: we're gonna have nine games that we're gonna play.
We're gonna have 22 trainings, okay?
And these numbers are just getting smaller and smaller,
and as these numbers go down, the stress and anxiety goes up.
[reporter] For all the players that get called into senior national team camp,
translation.ko: 국가 대표 캠프에 부름을 받은 선수들은

translation.en: there's a huge range of experience.
translation.ko: 광범위한 경험이 있어요 "메그 리네한 '디 애슬레틱' 선임 기자"

translation.en: Some players have no caps,
and a cap is just an appearance in an international match.
translation.ko: 캡은 국가 대표 팀 간의 국제 경기에 출전한 횟수를 말해요

translation.en: [Vlatko] It doesn't matter whether you have two caps or 200 caps.
The fact that you're in this room is already a good step forward for you.
translation.ko: 이 방에 있다는 사실만으로도 이미 한 걸음 전진한 거니까요

translation.en: Obviously, the question that everybody wants to know
is how do you stay in this room?
Win that, Sonnett, yes!
Win it back, win it back, blue!
Win it back!
We have blood!
A World Cup roster is the final squad of players that are chosen,
translation.ko: 월드컵 출전 선수 명단은 참가가 허용된 선수 23명에

translation.en: you're allowed 23 players, who are going to the World Cup.
translation.ko: "줄리 파우디 월드컵 2회 챔피언" 최종적으로 선발된 이들이 올라가게 되죠

translation.en: [player 8] There are so many players who could be on this roster.
translation.ko: 최종 명단에 들 만한 선수는 정말 많아요

translation.en: It's not a "for sure" for me, so it's different than other players.
translation.ko: 저는 '확정'이 아닌 거죠 다른 선수들과 달라요

translation.en: There are players that are for sure. We know who.
translation.ko: "소피아 우에르타 수비수" 확정된 선수들이 있고 누군지 알아요

translation.en: [Lynn] You have your veterans.
You have your Becky Sauerbrunns, Megan Rapinoe, Alex Morgans,
translation.ko: 베키 사우어브룬스 메건 러피노, 알렉스 모건 같은

translation.en: who have won all of the things.
Your Rose, Lindsey Horan, Julie, who have been on the team for a while.
translation.ko: 그리고 로즈, 린지 호런, 줄리는 대표팀 경력이 오래됐고요

translation.en: Then there's a group of people that, like, are bubble players.
translation.ko: 그 외엔 '버블 플레이어' 그룹에 속해 있죠

translation.en: [Foudy] A bubble player is someone that is just on the edge
translation.ko: 버블 플레이어는 최종 명단에 들 수도 있고 못 들 수도 있는

translation.en: of making the roster or not making it.
translation.ko: 최종 명단에 들 수도 있고 못 들 수도 있는 경계면의 선수들이죠

translation.en: They're on the edge of that bubble.
And that's never a fun place to be.
translation.ko: 그리고 거기는 계속 있기가 재미있는 곳은 아니죠

translation.en: As the pool for the US Women's National Team grows and grows,
translation.ko: 미국 여자 대표 팀의 선수 풀이 커질수록

translation.en: it's just harder and harder to get in the bubble.
translation.ko: 버블 그룹 안쪽으로 들어가기가 점점 힘들어요

translation.en: At the end of the day,
it's Vlatko Andonovski who has to make that call
and say, "Okay, this is gonna be our final 23."
translation.ko: 블라트코 안도노프스키가 결정하고 발표해요 '이 선수들이 최종 23인이다'

translation.en: The ball is going to come to you, okay?
And you don't know when that is gonna happen.
It may be in the most important time of the World Cup.
translation.ko: 월드컵 기간을 통틀어 가장 중요한 순간일 수도 있어

translation.en: So let's be ready for that one shot and one goal, all right?
translation.ko: 그러니까 그 한 슛과 득점에 대비해, 알았지?

translation.en: Let's go.
We're going to the Soccer Post store, um, that's just opening.
translation.ko: 이제 곧 문을 열 사커 포스트 매장에 가요

translation.en: So this is the launch of it, and it's an exciting day
because since moving to San Diego last year,
I have tried to really invest myself more into this community.
So this is just another step to doing that.
Oh actually, I think Charlie's coming
for, like, the next 30 minutes before swimming lessons.
translation.ko: 수영 수업 가기 전에 30분 동안 시간이 있어요

translation.en: We'll see how that works out.
This is so cool.
Charlie! Hi, babe!
What's up?
Look at all these soccer shoes.
No, not that one. Choose over here.
translation.ko: 아니, 그거 말고 여기 있는 거 해

translation.en: This one. Yeah. Nike.
All right, Chars. I think I need to take some photos. Okay?
translation.ko: 좋아, 찰리, 엄마 사진 좀 찍을게

translation.en: -Charlie, what do you need, babe? -[whimpers]
I know. Well, it's because you have to be quiet.
translation.ko: 알아, 네가 조용히 해야 하기 때문이야

translation.en: -[Charlie] No! -You don't wanna be quiet?
-I wanna go with you. -With me? I'm right here.
translation.ko: - 엄마랑 같이 갈래 - 엄마랑? 엄마 여기 있어

translation.en: -[sobs] I wanna be with you. -Okay.
This is my first World Cup as a mom,
so that is different.
It just makes it even more special.
Okay. But I have to work right now.
translation.ko: 알았어, 근데 엄마 이제 일해야 해

translation.en: -But I wanna be with you. -[Alex] Okay.
She puts things into perspective for me.
translation.ko: 아이 덕분에 제가 상황을 객관적으로 보게 돼요

translation.en: I'm just, you know, a mom to her.
I'm not this soccer player fighting for a roster spot,
translation.ko: 선발 자리를 놓고 싸우고 올림픽 트로피를 놓고 싸우는

translation.en: fighting for a World Cup trophy.
I'm just Mom.
And I think that makes me just really happy and at ease.
translation.ko: 그 생각을 하면 정말 행복하고 편안해져요

translation.en: Am I coming out?
Okay.
"I'm so excited to announce…"
"Let's continue to inspire the next generation together." Okay.
translation.ko: '앞으로도 계속 다음 세대에 귀감이 되도록 해요', 좋아

translation.en: I've never cut a ribbon before.
-[woman] Really? -[Alex] Yeah.
Thank you for coming.
You got the pink headband and everything.
translation.ko: 분홍색 머리띠도 하고 다 갖추고 왔네

translation.en: [Foudy] Alex actually reminds me very much of Mia Hamm
translation.ko: 알렉스를 보면 미아 햄이 많이 떠올라요

translation.en: because she does transcend the sport.
[man] Beautiful.
[Foudy] For a person who's on the street who knows nothing about soccer,
if you said, "Who's one player you know?"
translation.ko: 아는 선수 한 명을 대보라고 하면

translation.en: In our day, it would've been Mia. Today it's Alex Morgan.
translation.ko: 저 때엔 미아였고 지금은 알렉스 모건이에요

translation.en: Even if they don't have a clue about soccer or the women's national team,
translation.ko: 축구나 여자 대표 팀에 관해서 하나도 몰라도

translation.en: they know who she is.
And the ESPY goes to Alex Morgan!
translation.ko: "최우수 여자 선수" 올해의 ESPY 수상자는 알렉스 모건입니다!

translation.en: [Taylor Swift] I wanna talk about Alex Morgan.
translation.ko: 먼저 알렉스 모건 얘기를 하고 싶어요

translation.en: [woman] Alex!
The fact that she's here presenting this to me is such an honor.
translation.ko: 이 자리에서 알렉스에게 이걸 받으니 정말 영광이에요

translation.en: Sorry, but this is probably the second-best trophy we won this week.
translation.ko: 죄송하지만 이번 주에 받은 트로피 중 2위일 거예요

translation.en: [Ian] When you look at what she's capable of doing as a world figure,
she's transcended football.
I mean, she's almost like a political figure.
When you're the star that's saddled with a lot of the promotional responsibilities…
…it's a lotta time, a lotta energy.
We're trying to raise more opportunities for girls and women around the world
translation.ko: 우린 세계의 많은 여성들이 축구에 동참할 기회를

translation.en: to be able to be included and respected in the sport.
translation.ko: 더욱 많이 얻을 수 있도록 노력하고 있어요

translation.en: [Foudy] And to be able to balance it
and still be the dominant player that she is, is not easy.
translation.ko: 경기를 지배하는 선수 자리를 지키는 것은 쉽지 않아요

translation.en: [male announcer 1] Alex Morgan!
Morgan!
Fabulous goal.
What Alex has, you can't teach.
translation.ko: 알렉스의 능력은 배워서 습득한 게 아니에요

translation.en: -And she is so fast. -[male announcer 1] Goal!
[Abby] And then the strength that she has to score the goals that she's scored…
translation.ko: 그동안 넣은 골들을 넣을 수 있게 한 힘은…

translation.en: [male announcer 2] And there it is for Alex Morgan.
[male announcer 3] Alex Morgan has done it!
[Abby] …it's incredible.
[Alex] Being on the national team for 13 years, 14 years,
change is just part of the game.
Between 2019 and '23,
we've gone through five players who've had pregnancies.
[female announcer] The last time, number ten…
[Alex] You have a player like Carli Lloyd, who retired.
There was a lot of personnel changes,
a lot of players in that had never been in before,
a lot of players getting injured.
[male announcer 1] Mallory Swanson is hurt.
And immediately, they're calling for the stretcher to be brought onto the field here.
Not only that, um,
the coaching and all that staff changed.
[male announcer 2] That is it. That is the end of Jill Ellis's marvelous,
translation.ko: 끝났습니다 질 엘리스의 훌륭하고 멋진 이력이 여기서 막을 내립니다

translation.en: magnificent career.
translation.ko: 질 엘리스의 훌륭하고 멋진 이력이 여기서 막을 내립니다

translation.en: Two-time World Cup-winning coach.
translation.ko: 두 번이나 월드컵에서 정상에 올려놓은 감독이죠

translation.en: [Vlatko] All together!
[male announcer 3] US Women's National Team kicks off
translation.ko: 미국 여자 대표 팀을 블라트코 안도노프스키가 맡으며

translation.en: a new era as Vlatko Andonovski takes over it.
translation.ko: 미국 여자 대표 팀을 블라트코 안도노프스키가 맡으며 새 시대가 시작됩니다

translation.en: All right, ladies, let's jump into two groups here.
Red girls, blue girls. Two groups only.
translation.ko: 레드 팀, 블루 팀, 두 팀뿐이야

translation.en: [Foudy] When Vlatko was hired,
he was a player's type of coach.
Get a drink. We'll move on the other side.
[Foudy] A manager that players love,
and you still only hear good things.
And what coach do you only hear good things about?
translation.ko: 좋은 말만 하는 감독이 세상에 어딨겠어요?

translation.en: [Vlatko] Right. Now we go, play!
[Foudy] But you do with Vlatko Andonovski.
First, I should say welcome, or welcome myself.
translation.ko: 먼저, 여러분을 환영해 나 자신을 환영해야 하나?

translation.en: -[players laugh] -I'm excited to be part of this group.
He is so knowledgeable and meticulous and detail-oriented,
translation.ko: 그는 지식이 풍부하고 치밀하고 꼼꼼한 사람이지만

translation.en: but he's also got this really fun, goofy side to him as well.
[Megan] You look like you're sellin' ice cream or something.
translation.ko: 아이스크림 같은 거 파는 사람 같은데요?

translation.en: Hey, guys!
It's not always easy, especially after a coaching change.
translation.ko: 늘 쉽지 않지만 감독이 바뀌면 더 그래요

translation.en: Whether you liked the previous coach or not,
you knew what the sessions, the vibe would be like.
translation.ko: 훈련 내용이나 분위기는 그래도 잘 알았는데

translation.en: Now it's all different.
It's like, "What's different? Why?" Nobody likes change.
translation.ko: '뭐가 다르지? 왜 달라?' 변화를 좋아하는 사람은 없어요

translation.en: [Vlatko] Coming after a coach that won two World Cups,
translation.ko: 월드컵 우승을 두 번이나 달성한 감독 후임으로 왔으니

translation.en: I knew it was probably the… the toughest moment.
translation.ko: 제일 힘든 시기일 수 있다는 각오는 하고 왔죠

translation.en: [Megan] Jill's legacy is winning.
I mean, double World Cup champ. That's the expectation.
It's our responsibility to prepare you for that.
[Alex] Vlatko's coaching style is very tactically heavy.
translation.ko: 블라트코의 코칭 스타일은 전술적으로 매우 무거워요

translation.en: Before, I felt like-- I'm talking about, you know, '15, '11,
we were able to go out and play every game the same way.
translation.ko: 매 경기를 같은 방식으로 뛸 수 있었어요

translation.en: Ya know, we'd defend the same way. We'd attack the same way.
translation.ko: 같은 방식으로 수비하고 같은 방식으로 공격했죠

translation.en: You can't do that now.
Because the game has evolved so much,
we still have to adjust our game a little bit defensively,
and on the attack every game,
and I feel like Vlatko is incredibly good at that.
translation.ko: 블라트코는 그걸 아주 잘하는 것 같아요

translation.en: Every game is another step in our preparation for the World Cup.
translation.ko: 매 경기가 월드컵 준비의 또 하나의 단계야

translation.en: This one is no different.
Here we go. Let's go.
[Vlatko] The environment believes in it,
believes in success, believes in winning.
It's the mentality that has been created a long time ago,
and it's been nurtured and evolved.
translation.ko: 커지고 진화했어요 저 역시 이 일을 맡았을 때 그랬습니다

translation.en: And it's something that even myself, when I got this job,
translation.ko: 저 역시 이 일을 맡았을 때 그랬습니다

translation.en: I knew what I was getting into.
Let's go out and win it. Let's go.
It's literally win every game.
translation.ko: 말 그대로 모든 경기에서 이기는 거죠

translation.en: It's very simple.
If you win, you're doing well. If not, it's not good enough.
translation.ko: 이기면 잘하고 있는 것이고 지면 아직 부족한 거죠

translation.en: We gotta win games. That's what we mean. That's why you're here.
translation.ko: 경기에서 이겨야 해 우린 그것 때문에 여기 온 거야

translation.en: I always say it's the worst job in the world
translation.ko: 전 이게 세상일 중에 최악인 것 같아요

translation.en: because if you do your job, then you were just supposed to,
and if you do one hair less, then you're gonna get lambasted for it.
[male announcer 1] There's big questions for the manager to answer.
translation.ko: 감독이 답해야 할 중요한 질문들이 있습니다

translation.en: [male announcer 2] Questions and criticism will come to this head coach.
[female announcer] What can he do with this team, and what he hasn't been able to do.
translation.ko: 이 팀으로 뭘 할 수 있는지 뭘 못했는지를요

translation.en: [Meg] I think you have to be built so differently
translation.ko: 미국 여자 대표 팀 감독이 되려면

translation.en: to want the US Women's National Team head coaching job
translation.ko: 남다르게 단련돼 왔어야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: because you have the highest expectations and the highest pressure.
translation.ko: 사람들의 기대가 너무 높고 받는 압박감도 심하니까요

translation.en: [Vlatko] Hope you had an enjoyable weekend.
But more importantly, let's get ready for the World Cup.
translation.ko: 근데 더 중요한 일인 월드컵 대비를 잘해 보자

translation.en: All right? Let's go.
[Foudy] There's gonna be some pressure on him at this, his first World Cup.
And so, he needs the Alexes and the Rapinoes
translation.ko: 그래서 팀의 안정과 기반 다지기에 큰 역할을 해 줄

translation.en: that stabilize and ground the group.
translation.ko: 그래서 팀의 안정과 기반 다지기에 큰 역할을 해 줄 알렉스와 러피노 같은 선수들이 필요해요

translation.en: People say, "Well, Megan Rapinoe's at 38 years old."
"Should she be going to another World Cup?"
She's been out with a calf injury recently.
And who knows? Maybe she's rested, and it's fine, and it's a good thing.
translation.ko: 모를 일이죠, 휴식을 취했으니 잘됐을 수 있어요

translation.en: But you just don't know until you get there.
I say, "If she can give 20 minutes off the bench and change the game, why not?"
translation.ko: 하지만 20분 교체돼서 들어와 경기를 바꿀 수 있다면 뛰어야죠

translation.en: I'm gonna be knighted. I don't know when, so I just preemptively put that on there.
translation.ko: 기사 작위 받을 건데 언제일지 몰라서 미리 붙였어요 "P. 경"

translation.en: [Vlatko] She's so important to this team.
translation.ko: 메건은 우리 팀에 아주 중요한 선수예요

translation.en: [male announcer] What a World Cup for Megan Rapinoe!
She's seen it all.
My greatest superpower is I'm always me.
translation.ko: 저의 가장 큰 힘은 전 언제나 저라는 겁니다

translation.en: Lit!
[Abby] When Megan is healthy and when Megan is fit,
I don't know if there's been a better all-around player.
[male announcer in Spanish] Goal from Megan Rapinoe, 2-0!
[in English] With every World Cup, my life changed in a lot of ways.
translation.ko: 월드컵 때마다 제 인생이 많은 방면에서 바뀌었어요

translation.en: I feel like none of 'em are given, but this one in particular was so not given.
translation.ko: 아무것도 그저 주어진 적은 없지만 특히 이번은 더욱 그래요

translation.en: There's always so many players waiting in the wings, ready.
translation.ko: 너무나 많은 선수가 항상 대기하고 있죠

translation.en: Players that were just on the outside of last World Cup are, like…
translation.ko: 지난 월드컵 때 아깝게 선발 못 된 선수들이

translation.en: They're them now.
Since the beginning of the year, I've been taking it, like, camp to camp.
translation.ko: 올해 초부터 버텨왔죠 캠프에서 캠프 이런 식으로 '다음 캠프에 가야겠다' 했는데

translation.en: So I'm like, "Okay, I just gotta make the next camp."
translation.ko: 캠프에서 캠프 이런 식으로 '다음 캠프에 가야겠다' 했는데

translation.en: And then, like, now, it's day by day, and it just gets more and more stressful.
translation.ko: 지금은 그게 매일이니까 스트레스가 점점 더 심해져요

translation.en: Okay, guys, so we're gonna start, okay?
Yeah, so obviously, today, key game against the Spirit.
Remember, we get the ball to one side.
We create that open space in the middle for Kristie to be, in this case,
translation.ko: 중간에 열린 공간을 만들어서 이 경우엔 크리스티가

translation.en: the one driving the attack on that side.
Okay, Kristie?
We got a game plan, we got a style,
and you've been working on this for the last five months now,
so we know what we need to do to win.
[Kristie] This is my 12th year in the league.
I'm 32 years old now,
and for someone to tell me that I was gonna be in contention
translation.ko: 누가 제게 월드컵 출전 선수 명단에

translation.en: for making the World Cup roster at 32,
I would not believe you.
It's hard to do both.
I wanna be doing all of the things that the national team requires of me,
translation.ko: 국가 대표 팀이 요구하는 모든 것을 해야 하는데

translation.en: and they're all really important aspects of the game,
but I also am here to win in the league for Gotham.
translation.ko: 근데 고섬의 리그 우승을 위해 여기서도 뛰어야 해요

translation.en: [Foudy] NWSL is National Women's Soccer League.
translation.ko: NWSL은 전미 여자 축구 리그의 약자예요

translation.en: It is the third iteration of a women's professional league
in the United States.
In terms of evaluation for Vlatko Andonovski,
NWSL games became huge.
We fucking lost our momentum, like, when the goal got called back.
translation.ko: 공을 다시 가져왔을 때 모멘텀을 잃었어

translation.en: [player] I know.
[Kristie] With the rosters released in two weeks,
I am sitting in, like, a bubble spot.
I could go. I could very easily not go.
translation.ko: 갈 수도 있지만 못 갈 확률도 높아요

translation.en: This could define my career.
translation.ko: 이게 제 이력을 좌우할 수도 있어요

translation.en: [producer] Not to get into too much of the nitty-gritty,
but these past six months, a lot has happened…
Hold on one sec. Sam's calling me.
Are you here?
I'm in the USA!
Um, Sam and I have been together for almost two years.
translation.ko: 샘과 저는 사귄 지 2년 다 돼 가요

translation.en: Sam, she's just, like, the best person ever.
translation.ko: 샘은 제가 만난 사람 중 최고예요

translation.en: I feel like everybody says that about their partner,
but I just feel so lucky that she likes me. It's… [laughs]
translation.ko: 샘이 절 좋아하니까 전 정말 운이 좋은 것 같아요

translation.en: -[Sam] This one's nice. -[man] Thank you.
I mean, obviously, her as a soccer player, she's just like… incredible.
[male announcer] All the way through for Sam Kerr!
Australia's golden girl.
What an amazing goal-scoring record.
[Foudy] Wherever Sam Kerr has gone, she's lifted that team.
translation.ko: 샘 커는 어딜 가든 그 팀을 끌어 올렸어요

translation.en: She's clearly one of the best that has ever graced the field.
translation.ko: 단연코 지금까지 필드를 빛낸 최고의 선수 중 한 명이죠

translation.en: [Kristie] Today, we're gonna go to my sister's house.
translation.ko: 오늘은 제 동생 집에 갈 거예요

translation.en: She lives in Dorchester, and she's gonna be there with her husband.
My mom and my dad are gonna stop by.
-I've met the immediate family. -You've met Mom, Dad, Sam, Pat.
translation.ko: - 직계 가족은 만났었어 - 엄마, 아빠, 샘, 팻은 만났지

translation.en: Mom, Dad, Sam, Pat, but not the extended.
translation.ko: 엄마, 아빠, 샘, 팻은 봤고 확대 가족은 못 봤어

translation.en: -Right. Yeah. -So that's today.
I'm just so excited to spend time with my sister and with my family,
translation.ko: 가족, 친척들과 시간을 보내게 돼서 정말 좋아요

translation.en: and, obviously, having her here too is just the best.
So I feel like all my people are in one spot.
Hi. Mwah!
-[Kristie] How are ya? -I'm great now.
-[Kristie] We're making guac upstairs. -Okay.
-How are you? -[Kristie] Good. How are you?
Good. Hi, Sam.
-[Sam] Hey, how are you? Good to see you. -Good to see you.
-This is Sam. -Hi, Sam.
-[Sam] Hey, how are you? -Nice to meet you.
[Sam] Nice to meet you finally.
We're, like, both so, like, supportive, but also, like, so hard on each other.
translation.ko: 둘 다 서로를 무척 응원하지만 가차 없기도 하죠

translation.en: Do you know you guys conceded eight goals this year, four off set pieces?
translation.ko: 자기네 올해 8골 내준 거 알아? 4골은 세트피스로 내줬고

translation.en: -Yeah. I know. -[Sam] Corners, to be exact.
That's horrific. Half your goals come off corners. Do youse not work on it?
translation.ko: 끔찍해, 절반이 코너킥이라니 그거 해결할 노력 안 해?

translation.en: It's just like we're just not doing what we're supposed to.
translation.ko: 해야 할 일을 안 하는 거야

translation.en: Like, they're just getting free headers in the area.
-I'm joking. [laughs] -Well, be sweet. You know I don't like…
translation.ko: - 농담이야 - 다정하게 해, 나 그거 싫어하잖…

translation.en: It has nothing to do with you. You were front post.
If you'd jumped higher, it wouldn't have got to the middle of the goal.
translation.ko: 조금만 높이 뛰면 공 중앙을 안 맞히지

translation.en: -[Pat] That was an attack. That was cruel. -I was man-marking.
translation.ko: - 그건 공격이다, 잔인했어 - 난 맨 마킹을 하고 있었다고

translation.en: [Sam] I'm joking. It had nothing to do with you.
I think it drives us.
Like, we're both so competitive, but, like, then we have our support.
translation.ko: 둘 다 승리욕이 강하지만 서로에게 힘이 돼 주죠

translation.en: Some days, I'll come out from a game, or she'll come out from a game,
and, like, we'll just say we don't wanna talk about soccer.
translation.ko: 언젠가 제가 은퇴하거나 크리스티가 은퇴하면 축구 얘기는 하지 말자고 할 거예요

translation.en: I honestly think it takes, like… When we are together, it takes, what?
Two to three days to, like, settle in being with each other.
I think.
It's almost like it doesn't feel real that you're here for a week and a half.
translation.ko: 일주일 반이나 여기 있는단 게 실감이 안 나

translation.en: And obviously, you've been alone on your own time for so long,
and now I have to wait for her to do her makeup and get ready.
translation.ko: 지금은 크리스티가 화장하고 준비하는 동안 기다려야 하니까

translation.en: I'm just like, "Oh my God. Hurry up."
-It's like… -A change.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
-You wanna taste some of this? -Yep.
I put more lime and more salt.
Especially when you come to my house, 'cause you take over.
translation.ko: 특히 우리 집에 오면 그러지 자기가 장악하니까

translation.en: Yeah, I do.
I think we'll see how the World Cup goes and go from there,
but I think we definitely are over the long-distance thing.
Just get the spoon, babe.
You know where they are. Come on. Don't be cold.
translation.ko: 어딨는지 알잖아 이리 와, 차갑겐 하지 마

translation.en: Here's the spoon. [laughs]
Are you a movie star? Are you a movie star?
[Kristie] We'll clean the cutting board later.
translation.ko: 도마랑 여기 있는 것들 나중에 씻을게

translation.en: -Kristie, it's all good. -[Pat] It's all good, dude.
[Kristie] Sam, my sister, is just the best.
translation.ko: 제 동생 샘은 최고로 멋진 사람이에요

translation.en: I just, like, look up to her so much on and off the field.
[Mewis] Come on! Come on!
[Kristie] 2019, my sister was at that World Cup.
Obviously, I would have absolutely loved to have been there with her.
translation.ko: 저도 함께할 수 있었다면 정말 좋았을 텐데 아쉬워요

translation.en: We won!
I think for those years, I was like, "I'm not good enough to be there."
translation.ko: 당시엔 이런 심정이었죠 '난 그 정도 실력은 안 돼'

translation.en: Like, "These girls are incredible. They're so much better than me."
"My sister's killing it."
Sam played on a career-ending injury for four years.
translation.ko: 샘은 이력을 끝내는 부상을 입은 채 4년을 뛰었어요

translation.en: She's an anomaly, honestly.
She… I think a lot of doctors and people have said that she'll never play again,
translation.ko: 많은 의사와 관계자들이 다시는 못 뛸 거라고 했는데

translation.en: but I think she'll play again.
translation.ko: 제 생각엔 또 뛸 것 같아요

translation.en: [Mewis] I have been dealing with this injury for a long time.
I don't think about myself right now when it comes to the World Cup.
I'm just excited to see the roster, to cheer Kristie on,
translation.ko: 언니가 선수 명단에 들면 응원할 생각에 신나고

translation.en: obviously, cheer my other friends on.
Like, I'm really close with Lynn. Um…
So, I'm excited to watch. I think it's gonna be an exciting year.
translation.ko: 그래서 관전할 생각에 신나요 흥미진진한 한 해가 될 거예요

translation.en: [Foudy] The Mewis sisters are so interesting to see their evolution
translation.ko: 메위스 자매의 발전을 지켜보며 참 흥미로웠어요

translation.en: because you had, in Kristie Mewis, the elder of the two,
translation.ko: 둘 중 언니인 크리스티 메위스의 경우

translation.en: she started her career
really the one with the most, it looked like,
translation.ko: 팀 전원이 국가 대표 팀이 돼도 과언이 아닐

translation.en: potential to make the full women's national team.
They're not gonna love this analogy, but I see it as this almost leapfrog.
translation.ko: 이런 비유는 좋아하지 않겠지만 저는 '등 짚고 뛰어넘기'라고 해요

translation.en: As one has risen, the other one has had an injury or some setback of some sort.
translation.ko: 한 명은 위로 떠오르고 한 명은 부상으로 역행하니

translation.en: I can imagine their parents.
You have these two kids with such great success,
but really haven't been able to merge that together at the same time.
translation.ko: 그 시점이 똑같을 수는 없었던 거죠

translation.en: [Dad] There was a lot of competition in the backyard.
There isn't much lawn left there,
and the fence, actually, we had to replace sections of the fence
translation.ko: "밥 메위스 크리스티의 아빠" 울타리 중에 애들이 공을 차던 부분을

translation.en: from where they would kick the ball against it.
I never thought they would end up being friends.
translation.ko: 둘 사이가 좋아질 줄은 몰랐어 "멜리사 메위스 크리스티의 엄마"

translation.en: I really thought they would never be friends.
translation.ko: 절대로 친구는 못 될 거라고 생각했어

translation.en: -[woman] I told you they would. -They watched each other when they were
translation.ko: - 난 될 거라고 했어 - 서로를 아주 깔봤지

translation.en: as low as can be.
[reporter] What do you guys have in common?
-[chuckles] We play soccer. [laughs] -That's basically it.
We're very different.
[Kristie] Me and my sister will always be on each other's team.
translation.ko: 저와 동생은 늘 서로의 팀에서 응원할 거예요

translation.en: Like, my success is her success, vice versa.
translation.ko: 제 성공은 동생의 성공이고 그 반대도 마찬가지죠

translation.en: I've always felt like that,
so I think it's obviously probably really hard for her to watch me
translation.ko: 동생은 지켜보면서 분명히 힘들 거예요 제가 뛰는 거나, 자기가 있어야 할 팀이 뛰는 걸 보면서요

translation.en: and watch the team that she should be on,
translation.ko: 제가 뛰는 거나, 자기가 있어야 할 팀이 뛰는 걸 보면서요

translation.en: but I think at the end of the day, we're blood.
We're always gonna be on each other's team.
I would do anything for her to have her career back.
translation.ko: 동생이 이력만 되찾는다면 전 뭐든 할 거예요

translation.en: I'd give up mine if I could, but…
translation.ko: 할 수 있다면 제 이력도 포기하고 싶지만…

translation.en: -[Sam chuckles] -[producer] I'm getting emotional.
I know. I am too.
I know. I would, but…
-[producer] You're such a good sister. -[laughs]
She would do the same for me.
She's the best player I've ever seen.
She's so good. [chuckles]
-Huh? That's what you say to me. -Besides you.
translation.ko: - 응? 나한테 한 말인데 - 자기 제외하고

translation.en: I'm joking. I'm joking.
My Sams are the best. You guys are the best players ever.
translation.ko: 내 샘들이 최고야 둘이 역대 최고로 잘해

translation.en: [Foudy] Months before a World Cup, you're getting into that period
translation.ko: 월드컵이 몇 달 앞으로 다가오면 감독은 몇 가지 결정을 내려야 합니다

translation.en: where the coach has to make some decisions.
translation.ko: 감독은 몇 가지 결정을 내려야 합니다

translation.en: It's this lingering axe hanging over you.
translation.ko: 선수들 머리 위에 도끼가 매달려 있는 거예요

translation.en: It's that pressure of which side of the bubble am I on,
and am I gonna be on this roster or not?
[Vlatko] Stay with her. Stay with her. That's it.
This was the last camp we were gonna be viewed in before the roster.
translation.ko: 명단 발표 전에 받는 마지막 캠프 평가예요

translation.en: We get news that Julie Ertz was coming back.
I think it was a shock to everybody.
You know, Julie hadn't been there for two years.
Is Julie the same Julie as she was before?
I think that you question that for anybody who's gone through injury or pregnancy,
translation.ko: 부상이나 출산 후에 돌아오면 누구나 그런 질문을 받아요

translation.en: but you have other people coming back from injury too.
You had Kelley, who was coming back in.
So I think there's a lot of questions with a lot of people.
translation.ko: 그래서 많은 선수들이 많은 평가를 받을 거예요

translation.en: We have people in. We have people out. What's going on?
translation.ko: 들어오는 사람도 있고 나가는 사람도 있고, 무슨 일이죠?

translation.en: Every camp is important to perform. Yeah, of course.
translation.ko: 매 캠프에서 잘하는 게 중요하죠 네, 물론이에요

translation.en: But when it's around a roster pick, there's more tension.
translation.ko: 하지만 명단 발표 때가 되면 긴장감이 더욱 감돌아요

translation.en: It's kinda like, "I'm out here for myself."
"I need to perform. I need to prove that I deserve to be on this team."
translation.ko: '잘해야 한다, 팀에 들어갈 자격이 있단 걸 증명해야 한다'

translation.en: [Kristie] It is stressful.
Emotionally, physically.
When I'm in it, I'm like, "Oh my God. This is overwhelming."
translation.ko: 함께 훈련하면서 보면 너무 벅차다 싶죠

translation.en: I don't wanna be cut.
Every single day, you have somebody who is knocking on your door,
not necessarily waiting, but waiting for you to mess up, to get injured,
translation.ko: 경기를 망치거나 다치기를 기다리는 것 같아요

translation.en: waiting for you to fail,
so that they can come in and take your spot.
It's psychotic, but I can't believe I get to be a part of it.
translation.ko: 정신병적 생각이긴 한데 제가 뽑힌단 확신을 못 하니까요

translation.en: Oh my gosh. Look at how much space there is in here.
-[player] It's huge. -[Lynn] Massive.
Can you move so I can hang?
Decompress my back.
I feel like the whole time, I've been, like, an underdog.
I only got recruited from one team to go to college, which was Pepperdine.
translation.ko: 대학도 한 곳에서만 절 뽑았는데 페퍼다인대학교였어요

translation.en: Fought and clawed my way to get drafted.
My national team career has been up, down, up, down.
translation.ko: 국가 대표 팀 이력은 기복이 심했어요

translation.en: I've been on and off the team,
been considered for a roster, been dropped from allocation,
and I've been cut from the 2018 team, so I didn't make it to the 2019 World Cup.
translation.ko: 2018년 대표 팀에서 탈락해서 2019년 월드컵엔 못 나갔죠

translation.en: I said, "Okay, I didn't make the World Cup team."
translation.ko: 월드컵 팀에 못 든 걸 받아들이고

translation.en: I watched every game. I knew exactly what I needed to do to get back there.
translation.ko: 전체 경기를 봤어요, 돌아가려면 뭐가 필요한지 정확히 알았죠

translation.en: I felt like I was on a good roll.
And then I got injured.
[male announcer] Now the concern, though, Williams walking a bit gingerly.
[Lynn] That was 2022. It was devastating.
I knew how close the World Cup was,
and I knew that it was gonna be a stretch to get there.
And I just told myself, "I'm gonna try. I'm just gonna try."
And I said, "If I'm gonna fail, I'm gonna fail big."
translation.ko: 자신에게 말했어요 '망할 거면 크게 망할 거야'

translation.en: "So I'm gonna go out and do everything I could possibly do, and fail big."
translation.ko: '그러니까 할 수 있는 건 다 해보고 크게 망하자'

translation.en: I don't think it's a secret that I am one of the best defending forwards,
translation.ko: 제가 최고의 수비형 포워드에 속한단 건 비밀이 아닐 거예요

translation.en: I-- I would say, in the world.
[Meg] The forward pool in this country has always been a ridiculous one,
translation.ko: 이 나라의 포워드 풀은 늘 어이가 없었지만

translation.en: but it would feel absurd if she does not go to the World Cup,
translation.ko: 린이 월드컵에서 빠진단 건 말도 안 되죠

translation.en: and if she does not play a major role on this forward starting line.
translation.ko: 선발 포워드로 중요한 역할을 안 한단 건 말이 안 돼요

translation.en: [Lynn] For the longest time,
I have waited behind Megan, Christen, Alex,
translation.ko: 저는 아주 오랫동안 뒤에서 기다렸어요 메건, 크리스틴, 알렉스 등

translation.en: all of them who are these legends of the game.
And I've waited behind them because we're not that far in age,
translation.ko: 나이가 그리 많이 차이 나는 것도 아니거든요

translation.en: but we're not that close in age.
And then a couple years ago, Vlatko, and still now, is bringing in young ones
translation.ko: 그러다 몇 년 전부터 블라트코 감독이 젊은 선수들을 데려와서

translation.en: and giving them the opportunities.
Those players are going to be the future of this team,
but some of them are the right now of this team as well.
translation.ko: 일부는 지금 이 팀에서 활약하고 있고요

translation.en: One of America's most talented young soccer stars, Alyssa Thompson.
translation.ko: 미국에서 가장 재능 있는 젊은 축구 스타 중 한 명이죠 얼리사 톰프슨입니다

translation.en: [Abby] Most players' trajectory is to go from your club youth teams
translation.ko: 선수들 대부분이 밟는 경로는 클럽의 유소년 팀을 거쳐

translation.en: into the college program.
I always think it's super interesting when a kid chooses to forgo college, right?
translation.ko: 어린 선수가 대학을 포기하고 프로로 곧장 진출하는 것을 보면

translation.en: And to go straight into the pros, because it's so rare.
[Tobin] Everybody's goal,
every single women's player, girl's player's goal,
is to make the US Women's National Team.
translation.ko: 미국 여자 대표 팀에 들어가는 거예요

translation.en: And I think right now,
there's a pattern towards going pro early in order to do that.
translation.ko: 그걸 위해 프로로 빨리 진출하는 패턴이 생긴 것 같아요

translation.en: [woman] In the first round of the 2023 NWSL draft,
Angel City FC select Alyssa Thompson.
translation.ko: 에인절시티 FC가 선발하는 선수는 얼리사 톰프슨입니다

translation.en: I don't wanna head the ball.
Once the conversation about being pro came up,
I think it was the hardest decision I've had to make in my life.
translation.ko: 제 인생에서 가장 힘든 결정이었어요 "얼리사 톰프슨 포워드"

translation.en: [Alyssa] I was just like, "Okay, if I'm gonna do this, I'm not gonna look back."
translation.ko: '이 길을 간다면 뒤돌아보지 않을 거야' 했죠

translation.en: And from the time I went pro, it feels like a whole different life.
translation.ko: 프로로 갔을 때부터 완전히 다른 삶을 사는 것 같아요

translation.en: [Abby] In Alyssa's case,
to jump straight from high school to the professional league,
she had to have a lotta confidence.
[reporter] A question for each of you.
Thinking about the message you wanna leave to the fans.
We really appreciate just-- Do you want me to say something?
-You should do it. We're on the same page. -Okay.
We really appreciate all you've done.
translation.ko: 여러분이 해주신 모든 것에 정말 감사드려요

translation.en: If we're down a goal, if we're up a goal,
translation.ko: 뒤처져 있을 때나 앞서 있을 때나

translation.en: we hear you throughout the game, so that's really amazing.
translation.ko: 응원 소리가 내내 들리는데 그게 정말 놀라워요

translation.en: [Vlatko] I think her going into the professional ranks early helped her,
translation.ko: 일찌감치 프로에 뛰어든 게 도움이 됐다고 생각해요

translation.en: expedited her transition into the game,
and it's not just going into it,
but also performing well in the environment
against players that are gonna be in the World Cup,
with players that are gonna be in the World Cup.
translation.ko: 같이 뛸 선수들과 호흡 맞춘 것도 잘했어요

translation.en: [male announcer] Alyssa Thompson is gonna become the 70th teenager
translation.ko: 얼리사 톰프슨은 미국 대표 팀에 10대로서 처음 합류하는

translation.en: to earn her first cap for the US,
but the first one to earn it in front of 90,000 people at Wembley.
It's hilarious. I think Alyssa is, like, 18.
I've honestly just turned 38. So there's a lot of years between us.
translation.ko: 전 이제 막 38살 됐거든요 나이 차이가 아주 많이 나죠

translation.en: I wanna pull her aside and be like, "You're doing great, sweetie."
translation.ko: 따로 불러서 얘기하고 싶어요 '너 잘하고 있어, 정말이야'

translation.en: "Like, you really are." Um, because she is.
translation.ko: 따로 불러서 얘기하고 싶어요 '너 잘하고 있어, 정말이야' 그건 사실이니까요

translation.en: I mean, she missed her prom for… for an Angel City game,
translation.ko: 에인절시티 경기 때문에 졸업 무도회도 빠지며

translation.en: and she's crushing it.
translation.ko: 에인절시티 경기 때문에 졸업 무도회도 빠지며 너무나 잘하고 있잖아요

translation.en: So I'm just so happy to see someone so young get their chance.
translation.ko: 그렇게 어린 친구가 기회를 잡는 걸 보니 정말 기뻐요

translation.en: -Don't tickle me, please. -[girl 1] Get the phone! Get her phone!
[boy] When we're with Alyssa, I think we try to shift it
translation.ko: 친구들이 얼리사와 있을 땐 평범한 10대 소녀 얼리사로 전환시키려고 해요

translation.en: to regular teenage girl Alyssa stuff, 'cause a lot of her life is soccer.
translation.ko: 평범한 10대 소녀 얼리사로 전환시키려고 해요 삶의 많은 부분이 축구거든요

translation.en: [girl 2] She was a little late to our prom because she was playing a game, um,
translation.ko: 무도회에 좀 늦었어요 경기를 뛰고 오느라고요

translation.en: and she's missed a good amount of school these past few months,
translation.ko: 지난 몇 달 동안 놓친 학교생활이 꽤 많아요

translation.en: which has definitely been hard on her and her friends.
We miss her a lot, but we just treasure the moments we get with her.
translation.ko: 많이 보고 싶지만 같이 있는 순간을 소중히 생각해요

translation.en: Yeah.
[Alyssa] I felt like I didn't even go to this school 'cause I was never there.
translation.ko: 이 학교에 다닌 것 같지도 않아 무도회에 안 갔으니까

translation.en: [girl 3] People will be like, "Know what the best night of my life was?"
translation.ko: 사람들은 인생 최고의 밤을 꼽을 때

translation.en: They'll be like, "Senior graduation."
And yours will be like, "Playing in a World Cup."
-[Alyssa] Yeah. True. -[girl 3] It's gonna be a bit different.
[Alyssa] Yeah.
Karen and I are Alyssa's dad and mom.
Um, I wanna start off by saying thank you guys so much for being here.
translation.ko: 먼저, 이 자리에 와 주셔서 감사하단 말을 하고 싶어요

translation.en: It means so much, not just to us, I know it means a lot to Alyssa.
translation.ko: 우리뿐 아니라 얼리사에게도 큰 힘이 됩니다

translation.en: I told myself I wasn't gonna cry because I cry for everything.
translation.ko: 전 안 울 거라고 다짐했어요 매사에 눈물 흘리는 사람이거든요

translation.en: I'm just so proud of the woman that you're becoming.
translation.ko: 성장해 가고 있는 네 모습이 정말 자랑스러워

translation.en: We're so happy that each one of you were able to be here today
translation.ko: 오늘 여러분 모두 이 자리에 와서

translation.en: to celebrate this wonderful accomplishment of getting to the end of high school.
translation.ko: 고교 과정을 멋지게 마무리한 것을 축하해 주셔서 정말 행복해요

translation.en: Thank you so much, and happy graduation!
-[woman] Happy graduation! -Thank you.
-[woman] You did it. -Finally.
[woman] Finally.
-[Dad] Don't stay out too late, darling. -I know. I won't.
translation.ko: - 너무 늦지 마 - 알아요, 안 늦어요

translation.en: Building the roster, as a coach, we're making these decisions.
We never think about, how is this gonna change their life?
translation.ko: 이것이 그들의 인생을 어떻게 바꿀지는 생각 안 합니다

translation.en: What does it mean for them?
We're purely looking into it
as how is this person gonna help us win the World Cup?
translation.ko: '이 사람이 월드컵 우승에 어떻게 도움이 될까?'죠

translation.en: That's the only question we think about.
[Sofia] It's obviously been a dream of mine since I was a little girl.
I've been told no a lot. I still get told no.
translation.ko: 안 된다는 말을 많이 들었어요 지금도 여전하고요

translation.en: Like, they have these mock rosters for the World Cup.
translation.ko: 월드컵 대표 팀의 모의 명단이 몇 개 있는데

translation.en: I'm not on any.
I think we find out about the World Cup today.
translation.ko: 오늘 결과에 대해 알게 될 것 같아요

translation.en: You gotta play which way I'm going, girl.
I am just trying to distract myself, until the news comes, with soccer.
translation.ko: 축구 뉴스가 나오기 전엔 일부러 딴짓하려고 해요

translation.en: If I get that call from Vlatko
and he tells me that I'm selected to be one of the 23 for the World Cup,
like… [quick exhale] …crazy.
At this point, I feel like I've done everything I can,
so we're just waitin' and see.
I'm just gonna shoot him a text and say, "Hey, Vlatko, I'm available."
translation.ko: 문자를 이렇게 보낼 거예요 '블라트코, 저 시간 괜찮아요'

translation.en: I'll just say I'm available.
[Kristie] It's 4:00.
I just don't get it. It's 4:00-- It's 4:00.
Like… put me out of my misery.
Uh, you guys, I'm so nervous. I really am. [clears throat]
Okay. He just texted me.
He said, "Let me know when you're free to connect." Been free since 6:00 a.m.
translation.ko: 한가한 시간 알려 달래요 저 새벽 6시부터 한가했어요

translation.en: He said, "Let me know when you have a minute to talk, period."
translation.ko: 언제 얘기할 시간 되는지 알려 달래요

translation.en: Oh my God.
This one can go in any direction. She's very emotional too.
translation.ko: 어느 방향으로든 갈 수 있어요 이 친구도 무척 감정적이에요

translation.en: Is he FaceTiming me?
Hey, Sof, how you doin'?
I'm good, Vlatko. [chuckles] I can't believe you're FaceTiming me.
I just wanted to let you know that we selected you for the World Cup roster.
translation.ko: 네가 월드컵 선수단에 선발됐단 걸 알려 주려고 연락했어

translation.en: Okay, thank you so much, Vlatko.
For someone that makes it for the first time…
Ah! [laughs]
Thank you so much.
…this is, like, so cool.
Oh, my gosh. Thank you so much.
[Vlatko] Yeah.
This is something I've literally dreamed about for… I don't even know how long.
But then you have someone that has been there,
someone like Kelley O'Hara.
There is no player in the world that can match Kelley O'Hara mentality,
translation.ko: 정신력 면에서 켈리 오하라에 필적할 선수는 전 세계에 없어요

translation.en: especially in big tournaments.
Or Lindsey Horan.
You're selected on the World Cup roster once again.
translation.ko: 월드컵 대표 팀에 다시 한번 선발됐어

translation.en: You see that they don't take anything for granted.
translation.ko: 그들은 그 어떤 것도 당연하게 여기지 않아요

translation.en: Hey, it's the call.
It does not get old, and I'm still thrilled to be a part of the team.
translation.ko: 절대 안 질리는 말이네요 팀의 일원이 돼서 정말 기뻐요

translation.en: Tell me you've already had a crier, 'cause I was gonna cry no matter what.
translation.ko: 운 사람 있다고 말해 주세요 전 어쨌든 울려고 했거든요

translation.en: You're not the first one. Let's put it that way.
[laughs] Thank you, Vlatko.
[Vlatko] It's fairly easy at the beginning,
when you talk about the first ten and 12 and 14,
and then 17, 18, 19,
and then you come to about 20, and that's when you stop.
I go so back and forth with it.
Some days, I feel really confident.
Some days, I feel really scared, really nervous.
I feel like I'm not gonna make it.
So it's tough. It's super, super stressful.
[Lynn] You can be the best that you can possibly be,
translation.ko: 자기가 될 수 있는 최고가 될 수 있다고 해도

translation.en: and there's always somebody else who's trying to be the best that they can possibly be too.
translation.ko: 자기가 될 수 있는 최고가 되려고 노력하는 다른 사람이 늘 있어요

translation.en: I don't envy Vlatko because he has to look and say,
translation.ko: 블라트코가 전혀 부럽지 않아요 지켜보며 늘 이래야 하거든요

translation.en: "Okay, what 23 people complement each other?"
It's not just you.
[Vlatko] These are all players that put everything that they have
for this team, for this moment.
translation.ko: 이 팀과 이 순간을 위해 쏟아붓습니다

translation.en: [Vlatko] But I do know that this is part of the job,
translation.ko: 하지만 이것 역시 제 역할의 일부죠

translation.en: and no matter how we do it, somebody will be 24, 25, 26.
[Lynn] I just need to know.
He's FaceTiming me.
Hey, thank you for your time.
Just wanted to, uh, talk to you.
